title: Selling pair of N29/N43 Allen Ginter album pages
author: epike3

posts.post_title: Selling pair of N29/N43 Allen Ginter album pages
posts.post_content:
Asking $45 net to seller inc. shipping for the pair of pages including runners, track and field, a skater and other sports. These are beautiful and rare. I have several framed and hanging on my wall.

Not a great pix, but you can see the crease on the second page. You can probably notice some minor fading on these two pages if you compare side-by-side to other examples of these album pages.

Happy to trade for N43 or other items on my wantlist.

Best contact is ehpiiiATaolDOTcom. Thanks for looking!

Best,
Ed
